documents.document: Grand total of 3 days to get my @nvidiashield from @amazon US to New Zealand. Can't wait to try it tonight!

Slightly disappointed on the IO performance inside containers on @QNAP_nas - the UI is slick as though. Also, pressing h segfaults top, heh.
Ahh the @nzpost Twitter tracking using @nzposttracking is really handy, saves having to keep checking the site :)
@MetService Northland, up on the hill :)
@MetService Unless my weather station at home is lying to me, we clocked over 100km/h last night around 4:30am. Was pretty windy!

@vodafoneNZ Other times its - Online vanishes, US blinks, reboot fixes that too.
@vodafoneNZ Yip, DS/US goes away. DS Blinks until a power cycle. Comes back after that. Not something I can automate :)
@vodafoneNZ So the only issue that crops up now is if I push hard on the traffic the technicolor modem freaks out - everything else is OK.
@roboform @Animeimp @noblemo Busted here in NZ too.

Ugh, no more #eqnz, please 😕

Well seems my @vodafoneNZ connection is behaving a bit more since the new year - 0 outages yet. Good speeds from… https://t.co/q9evmEp9FL

Well, one of my providers isn't @NTPPool friendly. After the weekends traffic they turned my server off, even though I pay for the traffic!
Another windy night, another @vodafoneNZ outage 🙁 all *I* want for Christmas is a stable internet connection and to get what I'm paying for!
Hey @cloud - Palmerston North is not in Australia. It's in New Zealand, any chance of fixing that? https://t.co/gjuf1Zpjab
Would be awesome if some of the ISP's in NZ that use it would contribute resources back to @NTPPool (e.g. CallPlus, SlingShot and more).
Seems like the @NTPPool servers in #NZ are getting slammed today. Sadly not enough #NTP servers in the pool to soak it up...
@pizzahutnz hey is this your delivery folks parking on a near blind corner in Northland, Wellington? Not cool. https://t.co/PIn1kY9d6r
@RIPE_Atlas Hey, you send notifications for probe down status, any chance we can get the same for probe reconnects?
@MaikoAtOVH oh nice! I've not noticed a sunrise section, will look when at a PC. Thanks for the super quick reply!

@gowifinz Your sale must be popular, apparently 20-50% off crashes it :(
@vodafoneNZ sent you a reply, thanks for following up.
So after my hardware getting blamed and running on the @vodafoneNZ hardware, I've had another outage in less than 36 hrs since they visited.
@vodafoneNZ and it's almost always bloody windy in Wellington haha.
@vodafoneNZ as it is worse when it's windy and I had downed cabled from storm a while back which just got re-attached and not tested.
@vodafoneNZ as they want to do a modem replacement. Will monitor after that and see how it goes. I worry it's overhead damage though (cont.)
@vodafoneNZ Thanks for prodding people. Downer tried to come around (but I wasn't told in advance) so I rescheduled to tomorrow (cont.)
@blackforce777 I know that, I pointed out to them that they need to enable it in the @Cloudflare portal - Chrome just flags it in dev builds

Hey @TheRegister how about fixing the fact @googlechrome flags your site as insecure these days? https://t.co/MalDM9Avlp
Huh, so that's how many @EveOnline accounts I forgot about...did not know I had nine of them!?

@madjake45 Auckland is fine (mostly) and I'm not aware of any DC's that took a hit in the recent MM 7.8 quake. Can (and do) build around it

@madjake45 Nope, Australia and only Dedicated Servers sadly.
Why is it so hard to get hold of Colocation providers here in NZ... I want you to take my money!

@vodafoneNZ All good. Am at work now so can only reboot router if needed and not the cable modem. Let me know if need anything from me.
@vodafoneNZ Thanks for chasing it up. Upload tanked last night (and seems to have done so again) to below 10Mbps. Sitting at ~4Mbps this AM.
@vodafoneNZ thanks, it was up this morning so came right again overnight, so down ~9:30pm - 4am it seems. Prior to that speeds were terrible
